verses.verse: The burden<WH4853> of the word<WH1697> of Jehovah<WH3068> concerning Israel<WH3478>. Thus saith<WH5002> Jehovah<WH3068>, who stretcheth<WH5186> forth the heavens<WH8064>, and layeth the foundation<WH3245> of the earth<WH776>, and formeth<WH3335> the spirit<WH7307> of man<WH120> within him<WH7130>:

behold <WH7760>, I will make Jerusalem<WH3389> a cup<WH5592> of reeling<WH7478> unto all the peoples<WH5971> round about<WH5439>, and upon Judah<WH3063> also shall it be in the siege<WH4692> against Jerusalem<WH3389>.

And it shall come to pass in that day<WH3117>, that I will make<WH7760> Jerusalem<WH3389> a burdensome<WH4614> stone<WH68> for all the peoples<WH5971>; all that burden<WH6006> themselves with it shall be sore wounded<WH8295>; and all the nations<WH1471> of the earth<WH776> shall be gathered together against it<WH622>.

In that day<WH3117>, saith<WH5002> Jehovah<WH3068>, I will smite<WH5221> every horse<WH5483> with terror<WH8541>, and his rider<WH7392> with madness<WH7697>; and I will open<WH6491> mine eyes<WH5869> upon the house<WH1004> of Judah<WH3063>, and will smite<WH5221> every horse<WH5483> of the peoples<WH5971> with blindness<WH5788>.

And the chieftains<WH441> of Judah<WH3063> shall say<WH559> in their heart<WH3820>, The inhabitants<WH3427> of Jerusalem<WH3389> are my strength<WH556> in Jehovah<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635> their God<WH430>.

In that day<WH3117> will I make<WH7760> the chieftains<WH441> of Judah<WH3063> like a pan<WH3595> of fire<WH784> among wood<WH6086>, and like a flaming<WH784> torch<WH3940> among sheaves<WH5995>; and they shall devour<WH398> all the peoples<WH5971> round about<WH5439>, on the right hand<WH3225> and on the left<WH8040>; and they of Jerusalem<WH3389> shall yet again dwell<WH3427> in their own place<WH3389>, even in Jerusalem.

Jehovah <WH3068> also shall save<WH3467> the tents<WH168> of Judah<WH3063> first<WH7223>, that the glory<WH8597> of the house<WH1004> of David<WH1732> and the glory<WH8597> of the inhabitants<WH3427> of Jerusalem<WH3389> be not magnified<WH1431> above Judah<WH3063>.

In that day<WH3117> shall Jehovah<WH3068> defend<WH1598> the inhabitants<WH3427> of Jerusalem<WH3389>: and he that is feeble<WH3782> among them at that day<WH3117> shall be as David<WH1732>; and the house<WH1004> of David<WH1732> shall be as God<WH430>, as the angel<WH4397> of Jehovah<WH3068> before them<WH6440>.
And it shall come to pass in that day<WH3117>, that I will seek<WH1245> to destroy<WH8045> all the nations<WH1471> that come<WH935> against Jerusalem<WH3389>.

And I will pour<WH8210> upon the house<WH1004> of David<WH1732>, and upon the inhabitants<WH3427> of Jerusalem<WH3389>, the spirit<WH7307> of grace<WH2580> and of supplication<WH8469>; and they shall look<WH5027> unto me whom they have pierced<WH1856>; and they shall mourn<WH4553> for him<WH5594>, as one mourneth for his only<WH3173> son<WH4843>, and shall be in bitterness for him<WH4843>, as one that is in bitterness for his first-born<WH1060>.
In that day<WH3117> shall there be a great<WH1431> mourning<WH4553> in Jerusalem<WH3389>, as the mourning<WH4553> of Hadadrimmon<WH1910> in the valley<WH1237> of Megiddon<WH4023>.

And the land<WH776> shall mourn<WH5594>, every<WH4940> family<WH4940> apart<WH905>; the family<WH4940> of the house<WH1004> of David<WH1732> apart<WH802>, and their wives apart<WH4940>; the family of the house<WH1004> of Nathan<WH5416> apart<WH802>, and their wives apart;
the family<WH4940> of the house<WH1004> of Levi<WH3878> apart<WH802>, and their wives apart<WH4940>; the family of the Shimeites<WH8097> apart<WH802>, and their wives apart;
all the families<WH4940> that remain<WH7604>, every family<WH4940> apart<WH802>, and their wives apart.
